continents.name: Africa
continents.description: Explore the breathtaking wildlife of the African savannahs, from the Great Migration in Kenya to the vast plains of Tanzania.

locations.name: Masai Mara
locations.description: Home to the world-famous Great Migration and incredible big cat sightings.

locations.name: Amboseli
locations.description: Famous for large elephant herds with stunning views of Mount Kilimanjaro.

locations.name: Lake Nakuru
locations.description: A stunning lake known for flamingos and rhino sanctuary.

locations.name: Lake Naivasha
locations.description: A freshwater lake with incredible birdlife and hippos.

locations.name: Lake Elementaita
locations.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site known for flamingos and pelicans.

locations.name: Samburu
locations.description: A rugged reserve with unique species like Grevy's zebra and reticulated giraffe.

locations.name: Tsavo
locations.description: Kenya's largest national park, famous for red elephants and diverse landscapes.

locations.name: Nairobi National Park
locations.description: The only national park within a capital city, offering urban wildlife experiences.

locations.name: Ol Pejeta
locations.description: Home to the last two northern white rhinos and a chimpanzee sanctuary.

locations.name: Serengeti
locations.description: The endless plains hosting the Great Migration and unmatched predator action.

locations.name: Ngorongoro Crater
locations.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site with the world's largest intact volcanic caldera.

continents.name: Asia
continents.description: Discover the majestic tigers and diverse wildlife of the Indian subcontinent's national parks and reserves.

locations.name: Bandhavgarh
locations.description: One of the best places in India to spot Bengal tigers in their natural habitat.

locations.name: Ranthambore
locations.description: Famous for tigers amidst ancient ruins and stunning landscapes.

locations.name: Bandipur
locations.description: A premier tiger reserve in the Western Ghats with diverse wildlife.

locations.name: Kabini
locations.description: Known for the legendary black leopard and stunning backwaters.

locations.name: Kanha
locations.description: Inspiration for Rudyard Kipling's Jungle Book with beautiful sal forests.

locations.name: Pench
locations.description: A scenic reserve known for its tiger population and varied birdlife.

locations.name: Tadoba
locations.description: Maharashtra's oldest national park with excellent tiger sightings.

locations.name: Jim Corbett
locations.description: India's first national park, named after the legendary hunter-conservationist.
